overview: Everybody dies! AGAIN!  You thought Goremageddon was the ultimate climax of depravity. You were wrong. Dead wrong. Prepare for even more gore, even more shitlordery, even more exploding heads, and of course even more man ass!  A decade after the massacre that shocked Turku, Finland, the anonymous avenger has retreated to a cabin in the islands and leaves a peaceful and quiet life. But his peaceful existence is about to be disrupted, with bloody results...
title: Goremageddon 2
